Date: 2014-01-07 17:10 Title: Setting up rsr under web2py in a virtual environment Arch Linux Category: Python, Arch, web2py Tags: Python, Arch, Set-up, virtual environment, web2py

Aims:

Setting up rsr under web2py in a virtual environment under Arch Linux Install flot.js

URLs used:

  • https://github.com/dontgitit/rm also look at
  • https://github.com/dontgitit/bph

TL;DR

  • Log into your virtual environment
  • fire up web2py
    • enter admin interface
      • create new project
        • type in 'application name': rsr_app
      • click 'create'

Code

workon p2_rsr
cd .virtualenvs/p2_rsr #move to virtualenv directory
./bin/python ./web2py/web2py.py #launch web2py
